articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Greek President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Greek President
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Carlos Papoulias, president of Greece, on Mar. 17 on the occasion of its national day.
					 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Greece would develop with each passing day, the message wished the Greek president greater success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Italian Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Italian Foreign Ministry Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Italy headed by Attilio Massimo Iannucci, director general for the Asia and Oceania of the ministry, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets New Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets New Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, together with Cha Yong Myong, principal of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, met and had a talk with Liu Hongcai, new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday met and had a talk with new Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: DPRK, India Sign Plan for Cultural Exchange
articles.content:
DPRK, India Sign Plan for Cultural Exchange
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A 2010-2012 inter-governmental plan for cultural exchange was signed between the DPRK and India at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned and from the opposite side were members of a government cultural delegation of India headed by Secretary of the Ministry of Culture Jawhar Sircar and Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Pratap Singh.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Scientific and Technological Achievements
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Scientific and Technological Achievements
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Wednesday released a report on many world-level scientific and technological achievements made in the DPRK.
					According to the report, a great leap forward was made in the development of the nation's science and technology in recent years under the wise guidance provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who made the waves of the movement for pushing back the frontiers of science sweep the whole country.
					
					 The DPRK manufactured satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 entirely by its efforts and with its wisdom and technology and successfully launched it in April last year. This was a historic landmark in developing the nation's science and technology.
					
					 Scientists in the field of agricultural science researched into the first filial generation of rice of Korean style and introduced it into farming, guaranteeing a bright prospect of rice farming. They also bred species of high-yielding crops including the first filial generation of maize and seed bean and established virus-free seed potato production system in recent years.
					
					 Also researched and introduced were efficient cultivation methods including the method of cold-bed nutritive rice seedlings cultivation, sparse planting culture and double-cultivation suited to the double cropping as well as a new manuring method more than two times as effective as the preceding method.
					
					 Also among the successes are the development of phosphobacterial fertilizer capable of converting phosphor compounds in the soil into those absorbable by crops and new non-poisonous and environment-friendly bio-agricultural chemical Avermectin.
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex put all the production processes on modern lines and completed a computer control system of Korean style suited to the specific features of chemical industry, thus mass-producing vinalon and hundreds of varieties of chemical goods essential for light industry and agriculture.
					
					 Scientists in the field of light industry provided firm scientific and technological guarantees for improving the people's standard of living.  Those in the field of foodstuff processing industry developed such new kind of compound bacteria as peculiar fermentation agent and pickling agent in food processing.
					
					 The scientists and technicians developed CNC technology, making it possible to manufacture high-speed, high-precision and intellectual high-performance CNC equipment as they please. This laid a firm foundation for putting the nation's machine-building industry on the level of cutting-edge science and technology. 
					
					A Korean-style steel-making system has been established at the Songjin Steel Complex.
					
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex made such spectacular success as building a Juche iron furnace relying on raw materials and fuel found in abundance in the country.
					
					 UHP electric arc furnaces were built by Korean workers by their own efforts and with their own technology in a brief span of time. 
					
					 The Korean-style computer operation system has made rapid progress and, on this basis, the high-performance information processing machine, the cutting-edge technology, has been rounded off and new and efficient applied programs have been steadily developed on a high world level.
					
					 The DPRK's "KCC Go" program boasts the high level of IT development and its great potential.
					
					 Material and technological foundations have been laid to establish an innovative style of social, economic and cultural life such as business management based on IT, unmanned production technology process, electronic commerce and remote-control education.
					
					  A particular mention should be made of the manufacture of STM which signified a breakthrough in the researches into Nano technology and development of goods based on Nano technology.  
					
					The scientists in the field of bio-engineering have put basic technologies including the gene analyzing technology, biotic information technology and clarification of chondriosome functions on an advanced level of the world and are now widening the sphere of their application. 
					
					  The development of new technology of marine survey made it possible to conduct the survey of sea bed resources, marine observation and other work on a high level under a long-term plan. 
					
					 Scientists have also researched into and developed the technology of drawing three dimensional diagram by laser and precision measurement technology. 
					
					 The workers and technicians in Taehung have completed the production system relying on indigenous resources and technology, successfully putting the magnesia clinker industry on a Juche basis. 
					
					 The field of medical science established an online medical service system across the country and developed an air purifying and sterilizing device which is now used in the public health services and succeeded in manufacturing anticancer drug based on Koryo medicinal herbs found in abundance in the country. 
					
					 Korean scientists and technicians developed a large water disinfector and the technology of exploring sea bed artesian water in Korean style. They also industrialized the mushroom production and laid a scientific foundation for solving the feed problem in fish breeding.

articles.title: Pakistani Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Pakistani Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Arif Mahmood, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on March 23 on the occasion of the Day of Pakistan. 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Mun Song Mo, director of the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of the missions of international organizations here. 
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Pakistani embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Many People Visit Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Many People Visit Area of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Ten years have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu in March Juche 89 (2000). 
					 Under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area have been successfully spruced up as the base for education in the revolutionary traditions. More than 19 million people in total including servicepersons, working people of all strata and school youth and children made study tour of the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the past ten years.
					
					 Among them were many study tour groups including the group of the Korean People's Army for study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, the group of the Ministry of People's Security for study tour of Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, the national group of young vanguard for study tour, the national group of school youth and children for study tour and the national group of officials and members of trade unions for study tour. 
					
					 An endless stream of servicepersons and people visited the anti-Japanese battle sites to deeply grasp the glorious revolutionary traditions, strong roots and eternal cornerstone of the WPK. This is an expression of the unchangeable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, united close around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Microorganism-treated Drinks Developed
articles.content:
Microorganism-treated Drinks Developed
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Aeguk Research Center for Compound Microorganisms of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed drinks treated with microorganism.
					The antioxidant beverage, named "Isul", is a functional drink which contains several dozen kinds of essential nutritive elements such as amino acids and vitamins. 
					
					The drink made with extracts of natural medicinal materials, including Phellinus yucatanensis and fruits of Hippophae rhamnoides, helps prevent aging, autonomic imbalance and cerebral, heart, geriatric and other diseases and raise immunity.
					
					Another drink is a composite lactic acid beverage made by adding essences of such medicinal herbs as Atractylodes japonica and Epimedium koreanum to culture solution for composite microorganisms containing various kinds of lactic acid. It makes it possible to improve physiological functions of body.
					
					Its regular intake gives a good effect on the treatment of digestive troubles such as gastritis, colitis and pancreatitis.
					
					It is also good for preventing cerebral thrombosis and other geriatric diseases, cystitis and constipation and for recovering from mental and physical fatigue.

articles.title: Hydrometeorological Research Work Active
articles.content:
Hydrometeorological Research Work Active
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Hydro-meteorological Service of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has intensified a research work for giving accurate and immediate weather forecast and extensively developing and utilizing water resources.
					 The Central Meteorological Research Institute, based on satellite data, has built up a database of climate conditions suitable for major crop fields to give information of crops growth forecast in a regular way and put the agricultural production on a stable basis.
					
					 The institute has established a data processing system depending on MODIS satellite to make it possible to prevent natural disaster and pollution through strict observation of the atmosphere and environment in meteorological, marine, fishing and other sectors.
					
					 It has also established a dust storm forecast system and introduced precision equipment in acid rain measurement.
					
					 The Hydrological Institute has renewed the standard of hydraulic structures design to increase the construction speed of hydroelectric power stations while considerably reducing their construction costs. It has also developed a water-flow control system for power stations.
					
					 Colorful functions have been held in the DPRK to mark the World Meteorological Day, March 23, according to this year's theme "60 Years of Service for Your Safety and Well-being" presented by the World Meteorological Organization.

articles.title: Hongqihe Battle Demonstrates KPRA Might
articles.content:
Hongqihe Battle Demonstrates KPRA Might
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The victorious Hongqihe battle waged under the command of President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle marks its 70th anniversary on March 25.
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) was marching in mountains through waist-deep snow before it fought a battle in Hongqihe, China with enemies persisting in offensive against it.
					
					As it approached Damalugou, it had run out of provisions and clothes and shoes of its members were all worn out.
					
					 It attacked the "punitive" force in Damalugou by surprise and captured an enormous amount of trophies.
					
					 The news alerted the enemy forces in the Antu and Helong areas, who were hell-bent on annihilating the KPRA.
					
					 The President anticipated that they would follow in its wake by all odds and then made up his mind to strike the "Maeda punitive force" in a valley on the Hongqi.
					
					 He ordered each unit to climb down to the valley, then climb up the heights again, erasing their uphill footprints before lying down in the designated positions for the ambush and sent a decoy party to resume marching along the valley, leaving as many footprints as possible.
					
					 A group was positioned on the northern side of the first height in the valley to cut off any enemy retreat.
					
					 When the main body of the enemy was pouring steadily into the area of the ambush, men of the KPRA opened intensive gunfire.
					
					 Half of the enemy was killed by the very first strike.
					
					 Surprised by crossfire from the right and left sides of the valley, Maeda instantly dispersed his marching column on the spot and attempted to direct his main force to the height in the north to capture it, but was frustrated by the flanking fire of the guerrilla army from the bushes in the west.
					
					 In the heat of the battle, anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk saw some enemy soldiers approaching to the headquarters and lured them to the opposite side to shoot them dead with her excellent marksmanship.
					
					In the battle the enemy drank a truly bitter cup.
					
					 They learned the harsh lesson that, however zealously they might track the KPRA, no victory would await them and that instead they would experience a painful end, as the "Maeda punitive force" had done.
					
					 The battle demonstrated the political and military might of the KPRA to the full and inspired the people in northeastern areas of Mt. Paektu and the homeland with a firm confidence in the victory in the revolution.

articles.title: US Termed Disturber of Peace
articles.content:
US Termed Disturber of Peace
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary denounces the United States for openly using drones for intruding into borders of legitimate sovereign states and ruthlessly killing innocent civilians in disregard of international law.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S., when criticized for killing civilians in the drone attacks, did not bother to utter that it "was routing terrorists" and "it was inevitable that a few civilians were killed in the course of anti-terror war." This is a very shameless and inhuman behavior.
					
					 The awful consequences of the "drone war" prove once again that the U.S. is the arch criminal wrecking world peace and stability and the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 No matter who may come to power in the U.S., the aggressive nature and ambition of the U.S. imperialists will remain unchanged.
					
					 If the U.S. truly grieves over the victims of the "Sept. 11 incident", it should feel the same over the death of many civilians in other countries in the drone attacks. It should stop at once the above-said war.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can recover its setbacks in the "anti-terror war" by escalating the said war.
					
					 The more civilians the U.S. kills, the stronger the anti-U.S. resistance forces will grow worldwide.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to coolly face up to the reality and stop recklessly harassing peace and abusing human rights, though belatedly.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Hindering Denuclearization Process
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Hindering Denuclearization Process
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese ambassador in Seoul recently cried out for solving the "abduction issue" along with the issue of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday observes:
					
					 Disgusting and hateful is Japan's persistent stand to jumble up the "abduction issue" with such important political issue as the denuclearization of the peninsula though they are absolutely not relevant to each other.
					
					 Lurking behind Japan's desperate effort to jumble up the two issues is to deter the international community from focusing attention on solving the issue of the denuclearization and, furthermore, create conditions favorable for attaining its sinister political aim.
					
					 It is the strategic goal of the Japanese reactionaries to scuttle the denuclearization process, secure a pretext and justification for going nuclear, cover up Japan's crime-woven past and evade the redemption of its past wrongs.
					
					 Japan is now busy peddling the story that the simultaneous solution to the "abduction issue" and the "nuclear issue" is the way for settling the issue of the DPRK-Japan relations but this is nothing but sheer chicanery to falsify the reality. 
					
					 The bilateral relations have not yet been settled not because of the "abduction issue" and the "nuclear issue" but because of the attitude of Japan which has neither sincerely admitted nor made apology and reparation for the hideous crimes it committed against humanity by bringing the Korean people untold misfortune and pain after putting Korea under its illegal occupation for more than four decades.
					
					 Japan should sincerely apologize for the above-said crimes and make reparation for them. This is a starting point and the only way for improving the bilateral relations.
					
					 Japan had better drop its foolish intention to abuse the denuclearization issue for attaining its black-hearted objective.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Crying out for Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Crying out for Confrontation
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the chief executive of south Korea recently talked to the chief of the General Staff of the puppet navy about the "threat from the north" and "its provocation" and the puppet prime minister and the puppet minister of Unification vied with each other in hurling mud at the DPRK, vociferating about the "nuclear issue of the north." 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is great irony that the man who claims to be "president" allowed himself to falsify facts like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" lost to shame, in a bid to slander fellow countrymen. And what is more ridiculous is that his confidents thoughtlessly echoed his utterances.
					
					 When the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and replaces the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty, the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula will find a smooth solution, the commentary notes, and goes on: The above-said lackeys of the U.S. are in such poor position that they cannot say to their American master what they want to do. Yet, they make no scruple of letting loose vituperation against the north, not content with staging the nuclear war exercises targeted against the compatriots protecting the destiny of the nation. Can there be anything more intolerable than this ingratitude?
					
					 Their claim that the "root cause of the instable peace on the peninsula lies in that the nuclear issue of the north remains unsettled" is nothing but sophism to cover up their crimes.
					
					 Ever since their seizure of power, they have disturbed the peace of the peninsula and laid hurdles in the way of settling the nuclear issue, while rushing headlong into confrontation with fellow countrymen, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 They were reported to have prattled that they "would play a main role in leading the north to changes." But if they keep standing in the way of settling the issue as now, they will not be given any chance to participate in the negotiations, much less playing the above-said role.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive and his confidents would be well advised to stop talking disgusting barbs, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: Actions against Dependence on Foreign Forces Called for
articles.content:
Actions against Dependence on Foreign Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- In order to protect the national sovereignty and dignity and achieve national reunification in line with the intention and interests of all the Koreans the compatriots from all walks of life at home and abroad should reject flunkeyism and dependence upon foreign forces, enshrining the spirit of national independence, the idea of "By our nation itself," and resolutely struggle against foreign aggression and interference, observes Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					  Depending on foreign forces, taken in by flunkeyism, is an intolerable act of treachery as it is little short of allowing them to violate sovereignty and leaving the destinies of the country and the nation to their tender mercy. 
					
					 Looking back on history, outside forces have ruthlessly trampled down upon the Korean nation's dignity and sovereignty in a bid to attain their goal for aggression and meet their interests. The Japanese imperialists did so in the past. After their departure from Korea the U.S. forces landed in south Korea and split the Korean nation, viciously blocking its concord and reunification. 
					
					 Flunkeyism and reliance on foreign forces have done enormous harm to the Koreans in their efforts to achieve national reunification.
					
					 This is evidenced by the deplorable reality, a product of the sycophantic and treacherous policies of dependence on foreign forces enforced by the successive rulers of south Korea. 
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces have thrown a stumbling block in the way of independent reunification by pursuing sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces in contravention of the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration and the idea of "By our nation itself". DPRK-targeted war exercises were staged in south Korea without let-up, escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula. This is mainly attributable to the treacherous stand and approach of the south Korean authorities depending on foreign forces to hurt fellow countrymen in collusion with them in violation of the principle of national independence.
					
					 Flunkeyism and dependence on foreign forces will bring the Korean nation nothing but continued confrontation and division and escalated tension and danger of a war. National independence is the only way for reunifying the divided country and achieving peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Development of Science and Technology Called for
articles.content:
Development of Science and Technology Called for
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent and essential task facing the Korean people in their drive to build an economic power to develop the latest science and technology at present, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 A shortcut to bringing about a leap forward in the nation's economy lies in exploring new spheres of cutting-edge science and technology and actively introducing modern scientific and technological achievements. It is necessary to give priority to the development of the latest science and technology in order to bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year.
					
					 Developing the latest science and technology is an essential requirement for strengthening the Juche character and independence of the nation's economy in every way and an important guarantee for bringing about a high boost in production by accelerating the process for putting the national economy on a modern and IT basis.
					
					 Only by relying on one's own science and technology is it possible to fully ensure economic independence and dynamically push forward the economic construction despite the worldwide economic fluctuation.
					
					 A rosy future of the Juche-based industry can be guaranteed only by developing the latest science and technology. Only when the Korean people steadily develop the latest science and technology with their own efforts and wisdom in their own style, can they more strikingly demonstrate the validity and vitality of the line of the Workers' Party of Korea on building an independent national economy and bring about eye-opening changes in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 It is possible to successfully attain the grandiose goal for building an economic power when the level of technical equipment of the nation's economy is put on a higher stage through the wide introduction of the world-level cutting-edge technology.
					
					 The present stirring reality goes to patently prove that a shortcut to achieving a leaping advance in production and hitting the target of building an economic power earlier than scheduled lies in actively placing the national economy on a modern and IT basis on the basis of the latest science and technology.

articles.title: US-S. Korea War Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
US-S. Korea War Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet forces are now getting more frantic in the DPRK-targeted war exercises as an extension of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises, according to military sources.
					 The navy of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet navy are busy staging combined naval maneuvers. 
					
					 Prior to the start of these war exercises to last till March 28, Aegis destroyers John S. McCain and Mustin of the U.S. navy entered Tonghae port of south Korean Kangwon Province.
					
					 More than 10 warships including guided missile cruiser, guided missile destroyer, ocean-going minesweeping ship were brought to Phyongthaek, Mokpho and Pusan ports or deployed in the waters off east, west and south coasts of Korea. These huge naval forces for aggression are busy with naval mobile drills, exercises for torpedo operation, mine-sweeping operation and naval bombardment in coordinated operations with groups of warships of the puppet navy. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with these combined naval maneuvers, the U.S. imperialists deployed overseas-based fighter-bombers, pursuit-assault planes, planes for special operation, electronic jamming planes and rescue planes in air bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea. They are now busy with air battle drills and exercises for striking ground targets, providing close air support and carrying out airlifting missions in coordinated operation with flying corps of the south Korean puppet air force.
					
					 The warmongers of the south Korean puppet army got more frantic in war exercises in the forefront area.
					
					 105mm and 155mm artillery groups and tank groups of the puppet army deployed in the areas of south Cholwon County, Phaju City and Rinje County fired at least 300 shells on March 22 and 23, whipping up a war atmosphere. 
					
					 In this period the south Korean puppet army hurled "commandoes" of the special warfare command into operation theatres along the forefront for madcap spying training. The armed bandits of the south Korean puppet army who took combat positions in the areas of Phaju City, south Cholwon County and Rinje County desperately fired more than 13,500 bullets with 12.7mm machineguns and 5.56mm automatic rifles.
					
					 All these facts indicate that the war hysteria of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and warmongers of the south Korean puppet army to stifle the DPRK has reached an extremely reckless phase.

articles.title: US Bacteriological Warfare Disclosed
articles.content:
US Bacteriological Warfare Disclosed
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on March 20 issued a statement disclosing the bacteriological warfare carried out by the U.S. imperialists during the Korean war. 
					 The statement referred to the fact that various evidence proving the bacteriological warfare carried out by the U.S. during the Korean war was disclosed by a foreign press report some days ago. Also disclosed were video tapes testifying to the facts that the U.S. received materials on the bacteriological warfare from war criminals of Unit 731 of the Japanese imperialists and that officers of the unit confessed they helped the U.S. wage the Korean war and other information, it added. 
					
					 The statement charged that GIs who participated in the Korean war including a pilot of the U.S. forces who had been taken prisoner by soldiers of the People's Army testified to the above-said bacteriological warfare long ago and an international fact-finding group made a conclusion on the war but the U.S. has refused to admit the crime till now.
					
					 The recently disclosed evidence brought to daylight the truth about the bacteriological warfare fought by the U.S. and with nothing can it deny the hard facts, it noted. 
					
					 The statement urged the United States to admit the bacteriological warfare without delay, open to the public the truth about it and punish those responsible. 
					
					 The south Korean people will struggle to the last to force the U.S. to pull its forces and all its war equipment for aggression out of south Korea, declared the statement.

articles.title: Apr. Anniversary Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Apr. Anniversary Marked in Peru
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A lecture and a friendly meeting took place in Peru on March 13 and 14 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Yuri Cesar Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said at the lecture that Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK marked an important occasion in further demonstrating the might of the KPA as an invincible strong army. 
					
					 Under his leadership the KPA has grown to be the army strong in ideology and faith which no other army in the world can match, the secretary general said, adding that the KPA is prepared for both offensive and defensive, being possessed of a powerful nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 The KPA, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, would demonstrate its might as an invincible strong army in the future, too, he noted.
					
					 Speakers at the friendly meeting held by the Peruvian People's Women Union said with high appreciation that the Korean women are leading a genuine life as the powerful forces dynamically pushing one of the wheels of the revolutionary chariot, while enjoying all kinds of state benefits under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Voluntad Publishing House of Ecuador.
					 The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), expounds the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are the powerful political mode of our era based on President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the arms and the scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflect the requirements of the era and the revolution as well as the validity, advantages and the great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Rubricado el plan de intercambio cultural entre Corea e India
articles.content:
Rubricado el plan de intercambio cultural entre Corea e India 
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 24 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el plan de intercambio cultural para 2010-2012 entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de la India.
					En la ceremonia de firma participaron por la parte coreana el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Jon Yong Jin, y otros funcionarios relacionados, y por la india, los miembros de la delegacion cultural gubernamental encabezada por el secretario del Ministerio de Cultura Jawhar Sircar, y el embajador en Corea Pratap Singh.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia las maniobras anti-paz de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia las maniobras anti-paz de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncio a EE.UU. que infiltra de manera abierta con los aviones teledirigidos las fronteras de los Estados soberanos y matan a los civiles inocentes, dando espaldas a la ley internacional. 
					En cuanto a la muerte de los civiles por el ataque de aviones teledirigidos, EE.UU. dice sin vacilacion que "esta aniquilando a los terroristas" y que "es inevitable la muerte de algunos civiles en el curso de la guerra antiterrorista".
					
					Esto es un proceder muy descarado y antietico. 
					
					La amarga consecuencia por la "guerra con aparatos teledirigidos" vuelve a revelar que EE.UU. es el autor de la perturbacion de la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y es el archi-violador de DDHH. 
					
					Quien sea que tome el poder en EE.UU., no se cambian nunca la naturaleza y la ambicion agresivas de los imperialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					Si EE.UU. se siente de veras triste por las victimas de los "sucesos del 11 de septiembre", debe sentir pena por la muerte de incontables civiles de otros paises y parar de inmediato la "guerra con aparatos teledirigidos". 
					
					EE.UU. intenta recuperarse del fracaso de la "guerra antiterrorista" con la ampliacion de la "guerra con aparatos teledirigidos", pero en vano. 
					
					Cuanto mas mate EE.UU. a los civiles, tanto mas se aumentaran las fuerzas resistentes antiyanquis en el ambito mundial. 
					
					Aunque sea ahora, EE.UU. debe apreciar con serenidad la realidad y cesar de sus imprudentes actos de perturbacion de la paz y de violacion de DDHH.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela la ambicion de Japon para crear obstaculos
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela la ambicion de Japon para crear obstaculos
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el embajador japones en el Sur de Corea dijo que el "problema de secuestro" debe ser resuelto junto con el asunto de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					Resulta repugnante la actitud obstinada de Japon para mezclar el "problema de secuestro" sin ninguna relacion interna con el importante asunto politico de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Asi senalo el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 24 y continua:
					
					Estas maniobras de Japon parten del objeto de poner obstaculos para que la sociedad internacional no concentrara atenciones en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y, a la larga, de crear las condiciones favorables al logro de su malsano objeto politico.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses persiguen el objeto estrategico de llevar al fracaso el proceso de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana para adquirir el pretexto de su armamento nuclear, encubrir su pasado criminal y evitar su liquidacion.
					
					Japon difunde los rumores de que como si la solucion simultanea del "problema de secuestro" y el "problema nuclear" fuera un medio de la solucion de las relaciones entre Corea y Japon, lo cual no pasa de ser una farsa para tergiversar la realidad.
					
					Las relaciones Corea-Japon no se solucionan no por ambos "problemas" sino por Japon que no reconoce ni pide disculpa ni recompensa con sinceridad por sus archi-crimenes antieticos con que impuso incontables desgracias y sufrimientos al pueblo coreano durante su ocupacion ilegal de mas de 40 anos sobre Corea.
					
					La indemnizacion y disculpa sinceras de Japon devienen el punto de partida y el unico remedio de la mejora de las relaciones Corea-Japon.
					
					Japon debe abandonar su absurdo intento de abusar de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana en su malsano objeto.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la peroracion anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la peroracion anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el gobernador del Sur de Corea hablo de la "amenaza y la provocacion del Norte" al jefe del Estado Mayor de las fuerzas navales titeres del ejercito surcoreano, y el primer ministro y el ministro titere de "Reunificacion" le siguieron en echar maldiciones contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando el "problema nuclear de esta".
					Resulta muy ridiculo que, sin tener cara ni sentir verguenza, el "presidente" insulta a los connacionales tergiversando la verdad como el incendiario que grita "!Fuego!" y que sus ayudantes lo repiten como papagayo.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 24 y continua:
					
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana se solucionara sin dificultades si EE.UU. abandona su politica hostil a la RPDC y cambia el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea con el convenio de paz.
					
					Pero, las autoridades surcoreanas, lejos de hacer peticiones justas a su amo norteamericano,  desarrollaron el ejercicio de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC y echan hasta maldiciones injustas contra esta que defiende el destino de la nacion.
					
					Esto deviene un acto ingrato de recompensar con desgracias a las gracias.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos dijeron que la "causa mas fundamental de la paz inestable" se debe al "no resuelto problema nuclear del Norte", lo cual no pasa de ser un sofisma tendente a encubrir sus crimenes.
					
					Despues de tomar el poder, ellos perjudican la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y crean obstaculos en la solucion del problema nuclear recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida en adhesion a la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC.
					
					Hablaron de que "desempenarian el papel protagonico en orientar el cambio". Pero, si ponen como ahora obstaculos en la solucion del problema, seran rechazados.
					
					El gobernador y sus ayudantes del Sur de Corea deben tenerlo presente y abandonar la vil difamacion a los connacionales.
